participant_1.background:
My most exotic place was in the mountains of Nepal where I went hiking and got to see the Himalayas.
i have two dogs.
My cats and I love the rainy weather in Portland!
i live in a big city.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.

participant_2.background:
I'm not really into hobbies, but I love to play board games with my family.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
I make my living as a professional bowler.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
I do my laundry once a week, because that is enough to keep my clothes clean and fresh.

content.text: I love the rainy weather in Portland! It's so relaxing and cozy.
Oh, I hate the rainy weather. It makes me feel gloomy and depressed.
I guess it depends on your perspective. I love the way the rain makes everything look so clean and fresh.
I never really thought about it that way. I guess it could be kind of nice to see everything looking so clean after a rain.
Yeah, and it's also a great time to curl up with a good book or movie.
That's true. I do love to curl up with a good book on a rainy day.
Do you have any favorite board games?
I love playing Monopoly with my family. It's always so much fun to try to bankrupt everyone else!
Monopoly is a classic! I love that game too.
It's so much fun to see how everyone's personalities come out when they're playing.
Yeah, it's always interesting to see who gets really competitive and who just wants to have fun.
I'm always the one who gets really competitive. I just can't help myself!
Haha, I'm the same way. I'm always trying to win, no matter what game I'm playing.
I guess that's why we love Monopoly so much!
Exactly! It's the perfect game to get us all excited and competitive.
I'm glad we agree. Now I'm really looking forward to playing Monopoly with my family this weekend
